question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/algebra/fk_algorithm.rs] [Struct: FKDomain] [Prepared inputs integrity] The prepared_toeplitz_inputs are serialized/deserialized directly - can tampered serialized data create prepared inputs that don't correspond to any valid tau powers, breaking proof security? (Critical)

(High)
